remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已调用`AddRange`不将任何对象添加到集合中，直到调用。If has been called, `AddRange` does not add any objects to the collection until is called. 时，`EndInit`是调用，该集合将使用最新的调用中指定的项方式进行填充`AddRange`。At the time that `EndInit` is called, the collection will be populated with the items specified in the most recent call to `AddRange`. 如果`AddRange`多次调用中`BeginInit` / `EndInit`仅对最新的调用中指定这些项排序`AddRange`添加。If `AddRange` is called multiple times within a `BeginInit` / `EndInit` sequence, only those items specified in the most recent call to `AddRange` are added. ## Examples [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRelationCollection.AddRange Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRelationCollection.AddRange Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRelationCollection.AddRange Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRelationCollection.AddRange Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
